description:
For those facing criminal charges or injured due to the negligence of others, The Veitch Law Firm in Erie, Pennsylvania, is a strong advocate. Attorney Jeffrey Veitch is an experienced and dedicated criminal defense and personal injury attorney whose services are available to clients from Erie and Crawford counties and throughout NW PA.

A former prosecutor, Attorney Veitch brings more than 23 years of experience to the practice of criminal law and general civil injury litigation, including in the following areas:

• DUI/DWI
• Homicide and vehicular homicide
• Drug offenses
• White collar offenses
• Assaults
• Motor vehicle accidents
• Boating and motorcycle accidents
• Dog bites

In addition, Attorney Veitch defends clients facing prosecution for major traffic offenses and boating under the influence offenses.

Meet Attorney Jeffrey Veitch

After earning his Juris Doctor from Capital University Law School in Columbus, Ohio, Attorney Veitch worked as a prosecuting attorney for several years before establishing The Veitch Law Firm. He has handled thousands of criminal cases and litigated more than 100 cases through trial.

Over the years, Attorney Veitch has received numerous accolades for outstanding legal representation, including the following:

• Super Lawyer -- Washington Law & Politics 2016, 2017 and 2018
• Rising Star -- Law & Politics Magazine
• Who's Who in Criminal Defense & DUI/DWI Law -- Law & Politics Magazine
• 10/10 Superb Rating -- Avvo.com
• Top 100 Pennsylvania Trial Lawyers -- The National Trial Lawyers
• Chair Criminal Section of the Erie County Bar Association

The Veitch Law Firm offers free initial consultations and accepts all major credit cards for its clients' maximum convenience.
